Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1989...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1990, off Larry Christenson (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/1990, off Dennis Martinez (SF)...

Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 4/29/1993...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 7/8/1993...
